headline: Cadence & Microsoft Redefine Data Center Memory With Advanced Solutions
summary: CDNS unveils the first LPDDR5X 9600Mbps enterprise memory IP with Microsoft, bringing DDR5-class reliability to low-power data center AI.

headline: Should Motorolaâ€™s FIFA World Cup 26 razr Launch and ESOP Shelf Offering Require Action From MSI Investors?
summary: In early January 2026, Motorola announced the motorola razr FIFA World Cup 26 Edition, a special-edition foldable smartphone tied to its role as Official Smartphone Partner of FIFA World Cup 2026, alongside a US$306.66 million shelf registration for 800,000 common shares linked to an ESOP offering. The combination of a high-profile FIFA partnership, a collectible World Cup-themed device, and continued support for public safety initiatives through the Motorola Solutions Foundation highlights...
